name: The legend of the BioFire: Bellator 's Journey
tagline: 201?, I lost the cheat code... maybe its scattered somewhere.
body:
### Welcome to The Legend of the BioFire: Bellator's Journey
This is a terraria mod that's going to be mixed in with starbound kinda like a cross over, some music will be new and mine, new items,new enemies, new bosses, temples... You know what? multiple cross overs! lol jk copyright I'm going to have to ask the devs of starBound and terraria if I can do this. Planning to release the demo in 2018 full mod release is not planned yet. I may not even release the demo because this doesn't have very many stars on GitHub so if it gets to 58 stars then I wIll release the demo... once its finished of course. Phakathi izinhlamvu böyük, ikhodi ziyakuma. (Ka nav jēgas)  ;)

### Demo Version(s) (2018 June, 13th) Planning on that date 
 

### Summary well... I'm pretty much telling you what's going down towards the end... I may change it... may not. 

     Bellator, “ Tious, look out!” *Bellator jumps in the way of the spear* Tious, “BELLATOR!!” *Tious quickly rushes

 towards Bellator* Zerta, “ Puny mortals! Always questioning the power of a god!” Tious, “ I WILL NOT FORGIVE YOU FOR

 THIS!” *A red aura starts to appear around Tious and his eyes turn white* Zerta, “ What’s this?!” *Tious charges 

towards Zerta*. Tious, “ I’LL KILL YOU” *Tious attacks Zerta multiple times with the dark sky raging and volcanos’ 

erupting* Zerta, “ Agh! ACK!” Tious, “ TAKE THIS” * Tious takes both of his hands to charge up his attack* Tious, “ 

HAAAAAA!” Zerta, “ NO THIS CAN’T BE HOW CAN A GOD GET DEFEATED BY A MORTAL?! AHHHH!” *Tious now out of breath falls to

 the hard stone floor that is below him*. Tious, “ I *huff* did it *huff* for us, Bellator… *Looks at Bellator* for all 

of us *Looks at all of his dead best friends* *huff* for the world…” Tious bloody and torn up slowly closes his eyes 

and smiles because he saved the world from destruction… but he could not save himself or his friends... or did he save

one? *Bellator opens her eyes*


### Current Version 
V.0.0.3

### Creator and Contributors
Creator is xZerdious. Contributors (Coming Soon, hopefully one of them will be you) 


### Support and Contact (There is no nEed yet) 

### Disclaimer
This mod will always be fRee so if you bought it then you have been trickeD.
